<h3 id="X31317">X(31317) = PERSPECTOR OF THESE TRIANGLES: GEMINI 9 AND GEMINI 63</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^3+2*b*c*a^2+(b+c)*b*c*a+(b^2+b*c+c^2)*b*c  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31317) = 5*X(4699)-X(4741)</b>
<p>X(31317) lies on these lines:
{1,3797}, {2,38}, {6,75}, {7,1654}, {37,17339}, {56,27954}, {190,24357}, {192,5749}, {321,17027}, {354,31028}, {518,3661}, {726,17023}, {740,4393}, {871,3978}, {1001,6651}, {1278,17014}, {1757,4384}, {1921,3765}, {3008,27478}, {3252,19584}, {3662,3739}, {3666,16606}, {3696,28538}, {3873,31027}, {3923,4366}, {4372,17103}, {4645,24693}, {4675,27487}, {4687,29609}, {4688,4715}, {4692,30114}, {4732,31329}, {4751,17291}, {4850,31348}, {4968,17033}, {4974,20158}, {5220,16815}, {5695,20162}, {6542,27474}, {6645,16822}, {9055,17369}, {9318,27931}, {16584,28606}, {16825,20142}, {16975,31344}, {17048,31276}, {17141,26035}, {17251,31139}, {17266,27475}, {17308,27495}, {20678,26241}, {24046,27324}, {24231,24603}, {24327,27913}, {24331,27949}, {24346,27941}, {24514,26234}, {25253,26807}, {26240,27912}, {26561,30177}, {31041,31079}</p>
<p>
X(31317) = midpoint of X(75) and X(3758)<br>
X(31317) = reflection of X(17237) in X(3739)<br>
X(31317) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 24349, 335), (1215, 24631, 2), (17755, 24325, 2)<br>
</p>
